short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get notifications of new posts from Voxnaija.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The engaging daily publishing on Voxnaija makes it a popular music and news site among its users.

To stay up-to-date with the latest news published on Voxnaija, this extension is all you need.

This Chrome extension will notify you about a new post published on Voxnaija.
